name: SmartRent
0:
”Alexa, turn on living room lights.”
”Alexa, set the thermostat temperature to 72 degrees.”
”Alexa, lock the door.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: As a resident living in a SmartRent powered community, you can use voice commands to control all of your smart devices in your apartment through Amazon Alexa enabled devices. You must have a SmartRent account in order to use this skill.
